channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Crumbling pavement with loose chippings and muddy patches, 13th May
item.description:
The pavement on the corner of Green lane and Billbrook Road is in very poor condition. It's crumbling and uneven with loose chippings, mud patches when wet and vegetation growing through. It's been getter gradually worse over the last 5 years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Green Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: X2 orange armchairs fly tipped, 13th May
item.description:
Walk up the public footpath off Beeches Rs. Continue on straight up the hill, through 2 gates. You will then see a newly installed wooden handrail ahead. Continue up the hill and slightly to your left, you will see a big tree, looks like it's dying. The armchairs are beneath the tree. Arson risk in drier hot weather. Evidence of fires next to armchairs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Timbercombe Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
